action.ptxt: Repair and replenish referring to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .
Repair and replenish referring to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .

ps.ptxt: Maladjusted backlash between drive bevel pinion and gear

action.ptxt: Adjust as prescribed referring to Front Differential Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly:Front .

ps.ptxt: Improper tooth contact in the mesh between drive bevel pinion and gear

action.ptxt: Adjust or replace referring to Front Differential Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly:Front .

ps.ptxt: Loose drive bevel gear securing bolts

action.ptxt: Replace or retighten referring to Front Differential Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly:Front .

ps.ptxt: Damaged differential gear(s) or differential pinion(s)

action.ptxt: Replace referring to Front Differential Inspection:Front .

ps.ptxt: (Constant noise) Deteriorated or water mixed lubricant

action.ptxt: Repair and replenish referring to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .
Repair and replenish referring to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .

ps.ptxt: (Noise while coasting) Damaged bearing(s) of drive bevel pinion

action.ptxt: Replace referring to Front Differential Inspection:Front .

ps.ptxt: (Noise while turning) Damaged differential side bearing(s) or axle bearing(s)

action.ptxt: Replace referring to Front Differential Inspection:Front .
Adjust oil level referring to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .
